entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Leader
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:19 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Leader Airport 12:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -16.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -19.6°C
Wind: E 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
